Name: Talc Mg_3Si_4O_10(OH)_2
Type: Mineral
Class: Silicates
Subclass: Phyllosilicates
Particle Size: 125-500um
Sample No.: PS-14A
Owner: JPL
Wavelength Range: VNIR-SWIR
Origin: USA, Georgia, Cherokee County, Holly Springs
Collected by Burminco
Description: 





Measurement: Hemispherical reflectance
First Column: X
Second Column: Y
X Units:  Wavelength (micrometers)
Y Units:  Reflectance (percent)
First X Value:   0.40
Last X Value:   2.50
Number of X Values:  826
Additional Information: ps14aa.txt
